title: CyberTip Triage — Investigator Demo
description: 90-second product demo for ICAC task forces showing AI-powered tip prioritization, Wilson compliance automation, and warrant workflow.
target_audience: ICAC investigators and supervisors evaluating triage tools

cues.narration: Your task force received four thousand NCMEC tips last quarter. Most were triaged manually. CyberTip Triage changes that.
cues.caption: The tip volume problem

cues.narration: The dashboard surfaces what matters immediately. Stats cards show your current queue depth, pending warrants, and active P1 criticals.
cues.caption: Real-time operational picture

cues.narration: Every incoming tip is scored by AI and assigned a priority tier — from standard up to P1 Critical for active victim situations.
Filter to critical tier only. These are tips where victim crisis indicators were detected.
cues.caption: One-click critical filter

cues.narration: Select the first tip. The detail pane shows the NCMEC report data, AI analysis, and circuit-specific legal guidance.
The tier badge reflects the scoring rationale — here, age indicators and distress language elevated this to P1 Critical.
Now the compliance layer. This file is blocked. The ESP did not view it before reporting, so under Wilson, you cannot access it without a warrant.
cues.caption: Wilson v. Jessup compliance

cues.narration: The system enforces this automatically. No investigator can accidentally open a blocked file.
Legal notes are generated per tip, citing your circuit's case law. This language drops directly into your warrant application.
Click apply for warrant. The system pre-populates the affidavit template and tracks approval status in real time.
cues.caption: Integrated warrant workflow

cues.narration: Once the judge grants the warrant, blocked files unblock automatically. Full chain of custody is logged.
Notice this cluster alert. Forty-three tips reference the same viral image. The system deduplicates them into a single bundle.
cues.caption: Bundle deduplication

cues.narration: Less noise, fewer compliance risks, victims identified faster. CyberTip Triage — built for the work you actually do.
cues.caption: CyberTip Triage
